title: William C. McClearn Scholarship Endowment Fund
description: Scholarship support for a Law School student at CU Boulder who reflects the values of William McClearn with consideration for demonstrated strength of character, high integrity, intellectual ability, academic excellence & commitment to community service.
marketingContent: Scholarship support for a Law School student at CU Boulder who reflects the values of Wiliam McClearn with consideration for demonstrated strength of character, high integrity, intellectual ability, academic excellence and commitment to community service.
